title: Can you say your high school graduation was the best? Mine was. - Quora

response.answer_text: I enjoyed my graduation from high school but it wasn’t the best thing that happened when I was there. I love to sing and sang in the chorus and a double quartet . Those who took the class had the opportunity to compete against other schools and to attend some concerts as well. For me, that was one of the best things.

Actually it rained that day and our graduation was outside in the evening. People came to the ceremony drunk. My partner on the walk out didn't get his diploma because they gave me mine and his by mistake. But it was exciting that I was finished.
